actionUnits.condition: MonoBehaviour id 829909757 (guid 1b862119da8709d4e9055a3c441a7bb4) on GameObject id 829909756 is the 'room3' script. doorAnim (Animator fileID 1865011923) and winton (AudioSource fileID 829909759) are serialized in the scene. Child 'Sender' has a BoxCollider and LaserBeamSender MonoBehaviour id 5803819061987961593 (guid fe963bb06f1c63d4fa78e077220a709b). Manually invoke room3.SetLaser() once to simulate sender disconnect. Expected: laser1=true; door remains closed; no audio.

Second manual sender simulation. 'Sender (1)' also has LaserBeamSender (MonoBehaviour id 5803819061987961593, guid fe963bb06f1c63d4fa78e077220a709b). Call room3.SetLaser() again. In room3.Update(), when (laser1 && laser2 && !doorOpen) becomes true, doorAnim.Play('DoorOpen',0,0.0f) on Animator id 1865011923 and winton.Play() on AudioSource id 829909759 should run once; doorOpen=true.

Simulate LaserBeamSender hitting an object tagged 'Receiver' (CompareTag('Receiver') branch). Invoke room3.DesactivateLaser() on MonoBehaviour id 829909757. Expected: laser1=false if it was true; doorOpen remains true; no further animation/audio due to Update guard.

Simulate subsequent disconnect (non-Receiver branch) by calling room3.SetLaser() again on MonoBehaviour id 829909757 after door is open. Expected: laser1 becomes true again if it was false; doorOpen already true prevents re-triggering door animation/audio.
Coverage for additional script on Room 3: MonoBehaviour id 829909760 (guid e9bec2616c6206946b1a15b3faa151c2) is QuitGame attached to GameObject id 829909756. Invoke ExitGame() -> Application.Quit().

MonoBehaviour id 5374773463603666079 (guid 2723dba42bd113044ad231906b498006) attached to this GameObject is SnapToTrigger. Call Snap(Vector3 trigger_pos). After Snap(): XRGrabInteractable and XRGeneralGrabTransformer disabled, Rigidbody constraints FreezeAll, isSnapped=true and the cube rotates around local Y each Update.

MonoBehaviour id 5374773463603666079 (guid 2723dba42bd113044ad231906b498006) attached to this GameObject is SnapToTrigger. Call Snap(Vector3 trigger_pos) to snap and lock the second cube as well. Same postconditions as above.
